Yankee.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a soldier who fought on the side of the Union  (=the northern states) during the American Civil War
Yankee.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone born in or living in the northern states of the US – sometimes used in an insulting way by people from the southern US
Yankee.translation[0].definitions[2].def: an American – often used to show disapproval
